source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video is presented as a wide shot from a high-angle, isometric perspective. Initially, a warrior character stands in the center of the frame, in the middle ground, surrounded by several humanoid skeletons. The scene is enclosed by stone walls and pillars that occupy the middle ground and background. A user interface overlay is fixed in the foreground at the bottom center of the screen.
